thread.title: Henry
thread.title_full: Outsource Data Recovery reviewed by Henry

author: Henry
title: Henry
text: Chris was great from the first until the last moment. He helped so much and good follow up. I will recommend this company to anyone. Just sent your damaged HD and they will do some test and believe me they do in order to give you the best results. They will recover your data. It is an honest company. THANKS AGAIN.
